1438450.name: Woten DX - Traveller's Dream
1438450.description: Woten DX - Traveller’s Dream is a 2D puzzle-platformer imbued with the spirit of discovery! Dive headfirst into a rich and enchanting world full of charm, challenge and intrigue! Join Woten as he journeys across the Fossil Range, an unassuming archipelago home to a divine mystery. Solve perplexing puzzles, encounter curious creatures and unearth the secrets of a world lost to time in this adorable adventure!
